attributes.additional_details:
On the site Facebook, a friend shared a post from a page called Britain First.
A photo of the police force supporting equal rights appeared from Britain First and the caption said “This is utterly ridiculous! Shoving this nonsense in everyone’s face at every opportunity is not helping anyone! 👎”

LINK: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialBritainFirst/photos/a.346633882148546.1073741826.300455573433044/1478013509010572/?type=3
attributes.background:
Britain First do not believe in equality.
As a gay man I feel sadden, hurt and disappointed in England.
LGBT people should NOT have to feel out of place being on social media. We DO NOT need these vile posts or comments on social media. Ban hate against equal rights from Britain First.
